title: Reddit
cleaned_text: on Curseforge to find our packs! https://ko-fi.com/allthemods Has anyone run into this issue? I'm following the instructions. I have a crystal staff and verdant sprig on the altar, burning spell powder in the incense brazier, I got to activate the spell and I get this message: Ritual Found, but brazier ingredients are missing or not lit. Any info I find online is mostly outdated.
